sentence.Network_en: The Eukarya contains four kingdoms , the Animalia, Plantae, Fungi, and Protoctista.
sentence.Network_cn: 真核生物界包括4个界:动物界 、 植物界 、 真菌界和原生生物界.

sentence.Network_en: The higher organisms are embryonate and have two branches, Kingdom Plantae and Kingdom Animalia.
sentence.Network_cn: 高级阶段的生物为有胚生物,又分为两个分支: 植物界和动物界.

means.word_mean: 1. taxonomic kingdom comprising all living or extinct animals
